mapper.select: SELECT A.COMMENT_ID, A.ARTICLE_ID, A.USER_ID, A.USER_NAME , A.PARENT_ID, A.REG_DTM CASE WHEN (A.USER_ID != #{commentUserId} AND B.USER_ID != #{articleUserId}) AND A.CODE = '20' THEN '비밀 댓글입니다.' -- WHEN 신고 댓글 ELSE A.CONTENTS END CONTENTS FROM TB_COMMENT A INNER JOIN TB_ARTICLE B ON A.ARTICLE_ID = B.ARTICLE_ID WHERE A.ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE_ARTICLE (NOTICE_ID, ARTICLE_ID, NOTICE_STT_DTM, NOTICE_END_DTM) VALEUS (TB_NOTICE_ARTICLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{articleId}, SYSDATE, (SYSDATE + INTERVAL '14' DAY))
